## Notes 

Updates to version 0.2.2. Adds additional functions `generate.interaction.cov.input`, `power_interaction_r2_covs`, `power_interaction_3way_r2`, `simple.slopes.3way`, and `cor.mat.3way`.

## R CMD check results

There were no ERRORs or WARNINGs. NOTEs are related to the spelling of author's names. 

## Downstream dependencies

There are no downstream dependencies.

Passes R CMD check with no ERRORs, WARNINGs, or other NOTEs on:

1. Windows Server 2022, R-devel, 64 bit
2. macOS 10.13.6 High Sierra, R-release, brew
3. x86_64-w64-mingw32 (Windows 64-bit), R 4.2.3
